comment: Value of the rank function. Definition 9.14 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79 (proved as a theorem from our definition). This variant of ~ rankval does not use Regularity, and so requires the assumption that ` A ` is in the range of ` R1 ` . (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2013.)
